attributes.action: change organ donation to opt-out instead of opt-in
attributes.additional_details: the government should change the organ donation system to opt-out instead of opt-in. it would increase the number of transplants done and not only improve the quality of life for the organ recipients but also save the nhs a lot of money.  heamodialysis is one of the most expensive treatments in the nhs. £34000 per patient per year.
